Uses of Class
org.klotski.coding.UsernameCollector

Packages that use UsernameCollector
Package
Description
org.klotski.graphics
This package contains graphical classes for displaying Klotski Game.
They work well together thanks to Window class,
that places every piece and calls the right Controller of Controller package.
Block is inside Board that is inside Window.
LoginPage works as a stand-alone class to collect and show username before game starting.

    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    LoginPage(UsernameCollector usernameCollector)
    Constructor that stores an UsernameCollector object and sets default boolean values for some methods.
    It has to be used in connection with UsernameCollector to collect username to show, so an example of usage can be:
